items.sentence: It started raining, so I got under my friend\'s umbrella.
Tom can\'t speak French. Tom can\'t speak Spanish either.
Tom didn\'t ask Mary because he was afraid she\'d say no.
I don\'t have to be here. I\'m here because I want to be.
I don\'t know where Tom was and I don\'t want to ask him.
The autopsy confirmed that Tom died from a gunshot wound.
The doctor told Tom that he should try to get more sleep.
The escaped prisoners are considered armed and dangerous.
The first time I met Tom, he was only thirteen years old.
Speak louder. Your grandfather\'s hearing isn\'t so good.
